Favicon Generator

Create favicons for your website from any image. Generate multiple standard sizes instantly in your browser. No uploads to servers - your files stay private and secure.

How to Use

Select an image file (preferably square, at least 512x512 for best results), and click Generate. You'll get favicons in standard sizes ready for download.

Runs locally — no uploads. Your images never leave your device.

Drop an image here or

Selected file: ()

How this Favicon Generator works

This tool uses your browser's canvas API to resize your image into standard favicon sizes (16x16, 32x32, 48x48, etc.). All processing happens locally without uploading to any server, ensuring your images remain private.

Supported formats & privacy

Works with any image format your browser supports (PNG, JPG, WEBP, etc.). All processing happens in your browser - your images never leave your device, keeping your files completely private.
